```{r Setup, echo=FALSE}
require(ggplot2)
require(stringr)
require(plyr)
require(lubridate)
options(error=recover)
setwd("K:\\Development\\Components")
# setwd("C:\\Users\\Greg Sanders\\Documents\\Development\\Components")
Path<-"K:\\2007-01 PROFESSIONAL SERVICES\\R scripts and data\\"
# Path<-"C:\\Users\\Greg Sanders\\SkyDrive\\Documents\\R Scripts and Data SkyDrive\\"
source(paste(Path,"lookups.r",sep=""))
source(paste(Path,"helper.r",sep=""))

axis.text.size<-12
strip.text.size<-12
legend.text.size<-8
# table.text.size<-5.75
title.text.size<-12
geom.text.size<-12

main.text.size<-2
note.text.size<-1.40


Coloration<-read.csv(
    paste(Path,"Lookups\\","lookup_coloration.csv",sep=""),
    header=TRUE, sep=",", na.strings="", dec=".", strip.white=TRUE, 
    stringsAsFactors=FALSE
    )

Coloration<-ddply(Coloration
                  , c(.(R), .(G), .(B))
                  , transform
                  , ColorRGB=as.character(
                      if(min(is.na(c(R,G,B)))) {NA} 
                      else {rgb(max(R),max(G),max(B),max=255)}
                      )
                  )
```

```{r DateEntryAndProcessing, echo=FALSE}
zipfile<-unz("Data\\Defense_Summary_SP_FundingMechanismHistoryBucketPlatformSubCustomerRegime.zip",
        "Defense_Summary_SP_FundingMechanismHistoryBucketPlatformSubCustomerRegime.csv")

PlatformRegime  <- read.csv(
    zipfile,
    header = TRUE, sep = ",", dec = ".", strip.white = TRUE, 
    na.strings = c("NULL","NA",""),
    stringsAsFactors = TRUE
    )




PlatformRegime<-apply_lookups(Path,PlatformRegime)
names(PlatformRegime)
str(PlatformRegime)
PlatformRegime$USDATL<-factor(PlatformRegime$USDATL,levels=c("GANSLER+","ALDRIDGE","WYNNE","KRIEG","YOUNG", "CARTER","KENDALL" ),ordered=TRUE )
PlatformRegime<-subset(PlatformRegime,USDATL %in% c("YOUNG","CARTER","KENDALL"))

PlatformRegime$Graph<-TRUE

PlatformRegime$SignedQuarter<-as.Date(
    paste(as.numeric(format(PlatformRegime$SignedMonth, "%Y"))+
              floor(as.numeric(format(PlatformRegime$SignedMonth,"%m"))/10),
          (floor((as.numeric(format(PlatformRegime$SignedMonth, "%m"))-1)/3)*3+4) %% 12,
          1
          ,sep="-"),"%Y-%m-%d")-1

PlatformRegime$SubCustomer.component<-droplevels(PlatformRegime$SubCustomer.component)
PlatformRegime$SubCustomer.component<-factor(PlatformRegime$SubCustomer.component,
                                           levels=c("Army","Navy","Air Force","DLA",
                                                    "MDA","MilitaryHealth",
                                                    "Additional DoD Components"),
                                           labels=c("Army","Navy","Air Force","DLA",
                                                    "MDA","Military\nHealth",
                                                    "Additional\nDoD\nComponents"),
                                           ordered=TRUE)

```


```{r PlatformATLregime}
ATLregimeFYear<-aggregate(PlatformRegime$Obligation.2014
                          , by=list(PlatformRegime$Fiscal.Year,
                                    #                                                   PlatformRegime$SubCustomer.component,
                                    PlatformRegime$USDATL)
                          ,FUN = "sum"
                          ,na.rm =TRUE
                          )

names(ATLregimeFYear)<-c("Fiscal.Year","USDATL","AnnualRegimeObligations")
PlatformUSDATL<-subset(PlatformRegime,join(PlatformRegime,ATLregimeFYear)$AnnualRegimeObligations>=50)


ATLregimeDetails<-data.frame(USDATL= 'GANSLER+',
                             StartDate=as.Date('1997/11/10',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                             EndDate=as.Date('2001/05/10',format='%Y/%m/%d'))
ATLregimeDetails<-rbind(ATLregimeDetails,data.frame(USDATL= 'ALDRIDGE',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2001/05/10',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2003/05/22' ,format='%Y/%m/%d') ))
ATLregimeDetails<-rbind(ATLregimeDetails,data.frame(USDATL= 'WYNNE',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2003/05/23' ,format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2005/06/05' ,format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLregimeDetails<-rbind(ATLregimeDetails,data.frame(USDATL= 'KRIEG',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2005/06/06' ,format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2007/07/19' ,format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLregimeDetails<-rbind(ATLregimeDetails,data.frame(USDATL= 'YOUNG',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2007/07/20' ,format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2009/04/26',format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLregimeDetails<-rbind(ATLregimeDetails,data.frame(USDATL= 'CARTER',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2009/04/27',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2011/11/02',format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLregimeDetails<-rbind(ATLregimeDetails,data.frame(USDATL= 'KENDALL' ,
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2011/11/03',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=max(PlatformRegime$SignedQuarter)))



ATLregimeDetails$StartFiscalYear<-ymd(paste(year(ATLregimeDetails$StartDate)+
                                                ifelse(month(ATLregimeDetails$StartDate)<10,-1,0)
                                            ,"-10-1",sep=""))



PlatformUSDATL<-join(PlatformUSDATL,ATLregimeDetails,match="first")


PlatformUSDATL$Fiscal.Year[PlatformUSDATL$Fiscal.Year>PlatformUSDATL$EndDate&
                             PlatformUSDATL$SignedMonth<=PlatformUSDATL$EndDate]<-
    PlatformUSDATL$EndDate[PlatformUSDATL$Fiscal.Year>PlatformUSDATL$EndDate&
                             PlatformUSDATL$SignedMonth<=PlatformUSDATL$EndDate]

PlatformUSDATL$Fiscal.Year[PlatformUSDATL$Fiscal.Year<PlatformUSDATL$StartDate]<-
    PlatformUSDATL$StartDate[PlatformUSDATL$Fiscal.Year<PlatformUSDATL$StartDate]


```



```{r PlatformUSDATLmonthlyComponents}        

png(
    paste( "Output\\Platform\\",paste("DoD_components"
                                         ,"Obligation_2014"
                                         ,"Platform_sum"
                                         ,"USDATL"
                                         ,"6monthMovingAverage"
                                         ,sep="_"
                                         )
           ,".png"
           , sep=""
           )
    , type="cairo"
    , width=7.5
    , height=10
    , units='in'
    , pointsize=12
    , res=150
    )

# debug(LatticePercentLineWrapper)

PlatformGraph<-LatticePercentLineWrapper(
    "Platform Portfolio"
    ,""#Platform Portfolio by DoD Component and Starting Regime"
    ,"Month of Obligation (6 Month Lagging Average)"
    ,"% of Component Obligations"
    ,Coloration
    ,PlatformUSDATL
    ,NULL
    ,"SignedMonth"
    ,"Obligation.2014"
    ,"PlatformPortfolio.AnD"
    ,"SubCustomer.component"
    ,"USDATL"
    ,"StartDate"
    ,"EndDate"
    ,MovingAverage=6
    )

PlatformGraph<-PlatformGraph+aes(size=y.variable)
# PlatformGraph+geom_vline(aes(xintercept=as.numeric(StartDate)))+geom_vline(aes(xintercept=as.numeric(EndDate)))
PlatformGraph<-PlatformGraph+geom_rect(aes(xmin=StartDate, xmax=EndDate, ymin=-Inf, ymax=Inf),color="red",alpha=0,size=1)
PlatformGraph<-PlatformGraph+coord_cartesian(ylim=c(0, 1))+scale_y_continuous(labels = percent_format())+
    theme(legend.position="bottom",axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))+
    scale_x_date(labels=date_format("'%y"),breaks=date_breaks("year")) 
PlatformGraph
print(PlatformGraph)
#     PlatformGraph+scale_fill_manual(values = alpha(c("red","blue"), .3))
while(!(dev.cur()[[1]]==1)){
    dev.off()
    }

```

```{r PlatformATLpolicy}
PlatformPolicy<-PlatformRegime
PlatformPolicy$ATLpolicy<-as.character(PlatformRegime$USDATL)
PlatformPolicy$ATLpolicy[PlatformPolicy$USDATL=="CARTER"]<-"CARTER\npre-BBP"
PlatformPolicy$ATLpolicy[PlatformPolicy$BBP1==1]<-"BBP1"
PlatformPolicy$ATLpolicy[PlatformPolicy$ServicesRestriction==1]<-"Section 808\nFY12 NDAA\nImplem."

# PlatformPolicy$ATLpolicy[PlatformPolicy$ITFsmallBusiness==1]<-"Small Business\nTask Force"
# PlatformPolicy$ATLpolicy[PlatformPolicy$BBP2==1]<-"BBP2"

PlatformPolicy$ATLpolicy[PlatformPolicy$BBP3==1]<-"BBP3"

PlatformPolicy$ATLpolicy<-factor(PlatformPolicy$ATLpolicy,levels=c("GANSLER+","ALDRIDGE","WYNNE","KRIEG","YOUNG", "CARTER\npre-BBP","BBP1","Section 808\nFY12 NDAA\nImplem.","BBP3" ),ordered=TRUE )
# 
# ATLpolicyFYear<-aggregate(PlatformPolicy$Obligation.2014
#                           , by=list(PlatformPolicy$Fiscal.Year,
#                                     #                                                   PlatformRegime$SubCustomer.component,
#                                     PlatformPolicy$ATLpolicy)
#                           ,FUN = "sum"
#                           ,na.rm =TRUE
#                           )
# 
# 
# 
# names(ATLpolicyFYear)<-c("Fiscal.Year","ATLpolicy","AnnualPolicyObligations")
# PlatformPolicy<-subset(PlatformPolicy,join(PlatformPolicy,ATLpolicyFYear)$AnnualPolicyObligations>=50)
# 

ATLpolicyDetails<-data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'GANSLER+',
                             StartDate=as.Date('1997/11/10',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                             EndDate=as.Date('2001/05/10',format='%Y/%m/%d'))
ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'ALDRIDGE',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2001/05/10',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2003/05/22' ,format='%Y/%m/%d') ))
ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'WYNNE',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2003/05/23' ,format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2005/06/05' ,format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'KRIEG',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2005/06/06' ,format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2007/07/19' ,format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'YOUNG',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2007/07/20' ,format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2009/04/26',format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'CARTER\npre-BBP',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2009/04/27',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2010/09/22',format='%Y/%m/%d')))
# ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'Small Business\nTask Force',
#                                                     StartDate=as.Date('2010/09/23',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
#                                                     EndDate=as.Date('2013/04/23',format='%Y/%m/%d')))

ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'BBP1',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2010/11/03',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2012/07/30',format='%Y/%m/%d')))
# ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'WSARA regs',
#                                                     StartDate=as.Date('2011/03/16',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
#                                                     EndDate=as.Date('2013/04/23',format='%Y/%m/%d')))
# ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'BBP2',
#                                                     StartDate=as.Date('2013/04/24',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
#                                                     EndDate=as.Date('2014/09/18',format='%Y/%m/%d')))
ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'Section 808\nFY12 NDAA\nImplem.',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2012/07/31',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=as.Date('2014/09/18',format='%Y/%m/%d')))

ATLpolicyDetails<-rbind(ATLpolicyDetails,data.frame(ATLpolicy= 'BBP3',
                                                    StartDate=as.Date('2014/09/19',format='%Y/%m/%d'),
                                                    EndDate=max(PlatformRegime$SignedQuarter)))




ATLpolicyDetails$StartFiscalYear<-ymd(
    paste(year(ATLpolicyDetails$StartDate)+
              ifelse(month(ATLpolicyDetails$StartDate)<10,-1,0)
          ,"-10-1",sep=""))


PlatformPolicy<-join(PlatformPolicy,ATLpolicyDetails,match="first")

PlatformPolicy<-subset(PlatformPolicy,ATLpolicy!='BBP3') #Not enough to include

PlatformPolicy$Fiscal.Year[PlatformPolicy$Fiscal.Year>PlatformPolicy$EndDate&
                             PlatformPolicy$SignedMonth<=PlatformPolicy$EndDate]<-
    PlatformPolicy$EndDate[PlatformPolicy$Fiscal.Year>PlatformPolicy$EndDate&
                             PlatformPolicy$SignedMonth<=PlatformPolicy$EndDate]
```

```{r PlatformPolicyMonthlyComponentSolitary}

for (c in unique(PlatformPolicy$SubCustomer)){    
    png(
        paste( "Output\\Platform\\",c,"\\",CleanFileName(paste(
            c
            ,"Obligation_2014"
            ,"Platform_sum"
            ,"ATLpolicy"
            ,"6monthMovingAverage"
            ,sep="_"
            ))
            ,".png"
            , sep=""
            )
        , type="cairo"
        , width=10
        , height=5
        , units='in'
        , pointsize=12
        , res=150
        )
    
    PlatformGraph<-LatticePercentLineWrapper(
        VAR.name="Platform Portfolio"
        ,VAR.proper.name=""#paste(c,"Platform Portfolio by Starting Regime")
        ,VAR.X.label="Month of Obligation (6 Month Lagging Average)"
        ,VAR.Y.label=paste("% of ",c," Obligations")
        ,VAR.Coloration=Coloration
        
        
        ,VAR.long.DF=subset(PlatformPolicy,SubCustomer==c)
        ,VAR.ncol=NA
        ,VAR.x.variable="SignedMonth"
        ,VAR.y.variable="Obligation.2014"
        ,VAR.y.series=    "PlatformPortfolio.AnD"
        ,VAR.facet.primary="ATLpolicy"
        ,VAR.facet.secondary=NA
        ,"StartDate"
        ,"EndDate"
        ,MovingAverage=6
        )
    
    PlatformGraph<-PlatformGraph+aes(size=y.variable)+scale_size_continuous(name="Constant 2014 $ Obligated, Billions")
    # PlatformGraph+geom_vline(aes(xintercept=as.numeric(StartDate)))+geom_vline(aes(xintercept=as.numeric(EndDate)))
    PlatformGraph<-PlatformGraph+geom_rect(aes(xmin=StartDate, xmax=EndDate, ymin=-Inf, ymax=Inf),color="red",alpha=0,size=1)
    PlatformGraph<-PlatformGraph+coord_cartesian(ylim=c(0, 1))+scale_y_continuous(labels = percent_format())+
        theme(legend.position="bottom",axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))+
        scale_x_date(labels=date_format("'%y"),breaks=date_breaks("year"))
    PlatformGraph
    print(PlatformGraph)
    rm(PlatformGraph)
    #     PlatformGraph+scale_fill_manual(values = alpha(c("red","blue"), .3))
    while(!(dev.cur()[[1]]==1)){
        dev.off()
        }
    }


```

```{r PlatformPolicyAnnualComponentSolitary}
            ,"Obligation_2014"
            ,"Platform_sum"
            ,"ATLpolicy"
            ,"Annual"
            ,sep="_"
            ))
            ,".png"
            , sep=""
            )
        , type="cairo"
        , width=10
        , height=5
        , units='in'
        , pointsize=12
        , res=150
        )
    
    PlatformGraph<-LatticePercentLineWrapper(
        VAR.name="Platform Portfolio"
        ,VAR.proper.name=""#paste(c,"Platform Portfolio by Starting Regime")
        ,VAR.X.label="Fiscal Year of Obligation"
        ,VAR.Y.label=paste("% of ",c," Obligations")
        ,VAR.Coloration=Coloration
        
        
        ,VAR.long.DF=subset(PlatformPolicy,SubCustomer==c)
        ,VAR.ncol=NA
        ,VAR.x.variable="Fiscal.Year"
        ,VAR.y.variable="Obligation.2014"
        ,VAR.y.series=    "PlatformPortfolio.AnD"
        ,VAR.facet.primary="ATLpolicy"
        ,VAR.facet.secondary=NA
        ,"StartDate"
        ,"EndDate"
        )
    
    PlatformGraph<-PlatformGraph+aes(size=y.variable)+scale_size_continuous(name="Constant 2014 $ Obligated, Billions")
    # PlatformGraph+geom_vline(aes(xintercept=as.numeric(StartDate)))+geom_vline(aes(xintercept=as.numeric(EndDate)))
    PlatformGraph<-PlatformGraph+geom_rect(aes(xmin=StartDate, xmax=EndDate, ymin=-Inf, ymax=Inf),color="red",alpha=0,size=1)
    PlatformGraph<-PlatformGraph+coord_cartesian(ylim=c(0, 1))+scale_y_continuous(labels = percent_format())+
        theme(legend.position="bottom",axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))+
        scale_x_date(labels=date_format("'%y"),breaks=date_breaks("year"))
    PlatformGraph
    print(PlatformGraph)
    rm(PlatformGraph)
    #     PlatformGraph+scale_fill_manual(values = alpha(c("red","blue"), .3))
    while(!(dev.cur()[[1]]==1)){
        dev.off()
        }
    }
```
